body:
Updates via yum look good for both EL6 and EL7:

```
[root@fermicloud050 ~]# rpm -q htcondor-ce
htcondor-ce-2.0.2-1.osg33.el6.x86_64
[root@fermicloud050 ~]# yum update htcondor-ce.x86_64 --enablerepo=osg-minefield
Loaded plugins: priorities, protectbase, security

--> Finished Dependency Resolution

```

However if users update via `yum install htcondor-ce.x86_64` and already have the latest arch-dependent version of HTCondor-CE, yum will not update to the non-arch version.
